Name: Bakewell Tart Sour
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon (or orange) zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherries .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Express lemon (or orange) zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Exactly as the name suggests. Also works well served straight-up in a coupe.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Sean Cadger at The Outhouse in Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Bakewell Tart Sour contains 225 calories
